TABLE I
CLASSIFICATIONS AND STANDARDS OF QUALITY AND PURITY
WHICH ARE ASSIGNED TO WATERS OF THE HUDSON RIVER BORDERING COUNTIES OF ALBANY, COLUMBIA, DUTCHESS, GREENE, ORANGE, PUTNAM, RENSSELAER AND ULSTER

H portion

Hudson River

From boundary formed by northerly Rockland County
line on west shore and northerly Westchester County line on east shore to
boundary formed by Roseton on west shore and Low Point on east shore in general
area of Chelsea (Sta. 4). 1
